```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(patchwork)
library(viridis)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%")

theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis")

scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```


```{r}

ny_vax =
  read_csv("./grace/ny_covidvax.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(-region) %>% 
  rename(date = report_as_of) %>% 
  mutate(date = lubridate::mdy(date))


vax_plot_first =
  ny_vax %>%
  filter(date == "2022-11-14") %>%
  mutate(county = fct_reorder(county, first_dose, .desc = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = county, y = first_dose)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, hjust = 1))

vax_plot_first

```



```{r}

ny_death =
  read_csv("./grace/ny_coviddeaths.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  rename(date = report_date, n_fatality = place_of_fatality) %>% 
  mutate(date = lubridate::mdy(date)) %>%
  select(-deaths_by_county_of_residence) 


deaths_plot =
  ny_death %>%
  filter(date == "2022-11-14") %>%
  mutate(county = fct_reorder(county, n_fatality, .desc = TRUE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = county, y = n_fatality)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 80, hjust = 1))

deaths_plot

```
